title: Buyer beware
creator_credit: Vincent O'Donnell, Victorian Film Corporation, Rednose Revival and Peter Green
brief_description: An animated look at the perils inherent in signing a contract which considers such familiar situations as buying a second-hand car, building a house, and purchasing household goods. Points out the need for full awareness of the conditions of sale before signing by highlighting the headaches that await the foolish consumer. Narrated by Max Gillies. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
